title: 2005년 Jacob Eta-Ndu Catherine Eta-Ndu Danielle Eta-Ndu and Gwladys Eta-Ndu v. Alberto Gonzales, Attorney General of the United States of America 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Jacob Eta-Ndu Catherine Eta-Ndu Danielle Eta-Ndu and Gwladys Eta-Ndu v. Alberto Gonzales, Attorney General of the United States of America. 판결일: 2005-06-23. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Jacob ETA-NDU; Catherine Eta-Ndu; Danielle Eta-Ndu; And Gwladys Eta-Ndu, Petitioners, v. Alberto GONZALES, Attorney General of the United States of America, Respondent
**판결일**: 2005-06-23
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Benton, Colloton, Lay

## 변호인

J. Patrick McDavitt, argued, Minneapolis, Minnesota (John Troyer, Minneapolis, Minnesota, on the brief), for appellant., James A. Hunolt, argued, Washington, D.C., for appellee.

## 인용

- 411 F.3d 977

## 판결문 요약

411 F.3d 977
    Jacob ETA-NDU; Catherine Eta-Ndu; Danielle Eta-Ndu; and Gwladys Eta-Ndu, Petitioners,v.Alberto GONZALES, Attorney General of the United States of America, Respondent.
    No. 03-2287.
    United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit.
    Submitted: October 18, 2004.
    Decided: June 23, 2005.
    
      COPYRIGHT MATERIAL OMITTED COPYRIGHT MATERIAL OMITTED J. Patrick McDavitt, argued, Minneapolis, Minnesota (John Troyer, Minneapolis, Minnesota, on the brief), for appellant.
      James A. Hunolt, argued, Washington, D.C., for appellee.
      Before COLLOTON, LAY, and BENTON, Circuit Judges.
      BENTON, Circuit Judge.
    
    
      1
      Jacob Eta-Ndu, Catherine Eta-Ndu and two of their children1 — Cameroon natives — challenge a final order of the Board of Immigration Appeals ("BIA") affirming a departure order issued by the immigration court. Jurisdiction is proper under 8 U.S.C. § 1105a(a) (1994), because the proceedings commenced before April 1, 1997, with the BIA decision issued after October 30, 1996. See Pub.L. No. 104-208, 110 Stat. 3009 (Sept. 30, 1996), repealing 8 U.S.C. § 1105a (1994). The BIA is affirmed.
    
    I. Facts
    
      2
      Jacob Eta-Ndu entered the United States with a non-immigrant student visa on September 8, 1991, to attend the University of Minnesota. His wife Catherine and children followed on a derivative visa. On August 1, 1995, deportation proceedings commenced with an Order to Show Cause. T...
